Introduction

Raon (Korean: 라온; Japanese: ラオン), also known as Raon Lee, is a South Korean singer under Accelers. She made her debut as a soloist singer on February 2, 2022 in Japan with the digital single "Queen Fox". She later went onto also make a debut in Korean music with the digital single, "Like Like", released on March 15, 2023.
